name: Race of the Ages
description:
Take a journey through time and explore the marvels of the ancient world in this 3D action platformer. Made for Godot Wild Jam #42. The theme was "Ancient". I used the Speedrun Wildcard.

  • Controls: WASD to move, Mouse (or arrow keys) to look around, Space to jump, P for pause/settings
  • Graphics: I made and designed everything myself (all the 3D environments and architecture), except I used public-domain (CC0) textures from opengameart.org and this fire shader from the Godot asset library.
  • Music: The song is "Patagonia" by Scott Buckley, https://www.scottbuckley.com.au/ .
  • Sound Effects: I recorded the fall sound myself. Other sounds are from mixkit.co.
  • Accessibility Features: Large font size, high-contrast text, option between mouse or arrow keys (for players who dislike mouse), mouse sensitivity can be adjusted, music / sfx volumes can be separately adjusted, simple controls
